Class Segment

java.lang.Object
  rampancy.statistics.segments.Segment
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeltaHeadingSegment, DistanceSegment, HeadingSegment, LateralVelocitySegment, MoveTimesSegment, NearWallSegment
public abstract class Segment
extends java.lang.Object

This is the abstract class that represents a segment

Matthew Chun-Lum
